name: The verb "strutted" shows how proud Henry and the othor recruits were. "They were proud" is flat and purely descriptive by comparison. "Strutted" contributes to the tone of wonder and excitement.
value: The verb "strutted" shows how proud Henry and the othor recruits were. "They were proud" is flat and purely descriptive by comparison. "Strutted" contributes to the tone of wonder and excitement.
